column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My friend brought me this place and said this is one of the best pizza place in Chicago. We are ordered the trio drip with chip
column2: one medium classic pizza and one medium the Lou. The trio drip is a good pick and the garlic drip is my favorite. The pizza is big and filling. Between the two I like the classic better than the Lou. The classic has a big flat sausage and cheese on the pizza that is my favorite. We are in a group of 5 guys and we have one slice each left from the two pizza so beware that the portion when you are ordering.
